plot_1a.scene: 森林中的小径上覆盖着薄薄一层新雪。风从树间穿过带来刺骨的寒意。
plot_1a.script_draft:
<involved_characters>
罗柏, 布兰
</involved_characters>
<script_draft>
<scene_heading>
EXT. 森林中的小径 - DAY
</scene_heading>
<character_performance>
<character>环境音效</character>
<performance>马蹄声在寂静中显得格外清晰，风从树间穿过带来刺骨的寒意。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>（缓缓前行，表情沉重）布兰，父亲在君临受了伤。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>（心猛地一紧，抬头看着哥哥）受伤？严重吗？</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>（叹了口气，眼神充满担忧）我不知道具体情况，但据说很严重。还有，我们的侍卫被杀了。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>（感到一阵寒意，紧紧抓住缰绳）为什么会这样？是谁干的？</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>（摇了摇头，目光扫视着周围的树林）现在还不清楚。但是南方的政治局势非常复杂。家族之间的纷争越来越激烈，尤其是那些觊觎铁王座的人。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>（不解地问）他们为什么要针对我们家？</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>因为我们是北境的守护者，而且父亲一直坚持正义。有些人不喜欢这一点。他们害怕父亲的力量和影响力。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>（点了点头，心中仍有无数疑问）我希望一切都能回到从前。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>（坚定地说）我们会找到解决办法的，无论发生什么，我们都会一起面对。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>（突然打破了沉默，眼中闪过一丝怀念）你还记得我们一起玩的日子吗？</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>（微微一笑，拍了拍弟弟的肩膀）当然记得。那时的我们无忧无虑，没有这么多烦恼。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>（笑了，但笑容中带着一丝苦涩）我希望一切都能回到从前。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>（坚定地说）我们会找到解决办法的，无论发生什么，我们都会一起面对。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>两人</character>
<performance>继续前进，偶尔停下来让马匹休息。</performance>
</character_performance>
</script_draft>

plot_1b.scene: 森林中一处相对开阔且避风的地方，阳光透过稀疏的云层洒下微弱光芒。
plot_1b.script_draft:
<scene>
森林中一处相对开阔且避风的地方，阳光透过稀疏的云层洒下微弱光芒。
</scene>
<involved_characters>
罗柏, 布兰
</involved_characters>
<script_draft>
<scene_heading>
EXT. 森林中相对开阔且避风的地方 - DAY
</scene_heading>

<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>罗柏和布兰停下马匹，两人坐在一块大石头上。罗柏深吸了一口气，打破了寂静。</performance>
</character_performance>

<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>“布兰，我们得想个办法。”罗柏的声音带着坚定，但也能听出一丝疲惫。</performance>
</character_performance>

<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>布兰抬头看着哥哥，眼神中满是迷茫。“可是我们能做什么呢？父亲受伤了，侍卫也被杀了……”他的声音越来越低，仿佛在自言自语。</performance>
</character_performance>

<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>罗柏深吸了一口气，拍拍弟弟的肩膀，“我知道现在情况很糟糕，但我们不能坐以待毙。我们必须采取行动。”</performance>
</character_performance>

<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>“什么行动？”布兰急切地问。</performance>
</character_performance>

<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>“首先，我们要加强临冬城的防御。”罗柏开始详细解释，“城墙需要加固，护城河也要清理干净。还要确保有足够的粮食和武器储备，以防万一。”</performance>
</character_performance>

<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>布兰点了点头，虽然他年纪尚小，但这些话让他感到一丝安心。“那其他方面呢？”</performance>
</character_performance>

<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>“我们需要联系我们的盟友，寻求他们的支持。”罗柏继续说道，“尤其是北方的各个家族，他们一直是史塔克家族的忠实盟友。我们可以派人去与他们商议，看看能否得到更多的援助。”</performance>
</character_performance>

<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>布兰的眼神逐渐变得坚定起来。“好主意！我们应该尽快行动。”</performance>
</character_performance>

<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>“对，时间不等人。”罗柏站起身来，伸出手拉起布兰，“我们回去之后就开始着手准备。我会派信使前往各处，同时组织人手加强城墙。”</performance>
</character_performance>

<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>布兰也站了起来，两兄弟相视一笑，心中的担忧似乎减轻了一些。“谢谢你，罗柏。有你在身边，我觉得好多了。”</performance>
</character_performance>

<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>“我们是兄弟，无论发生什么，我都会保护你。”罗柏紧紧握住布兰的手，“我们一起面对这一切。”</performance>
</character_performance>

<character_performance>
<character>罗柏, 布兰</character>
<performance>两人骑上马，继续沿着小径前行。尽管前方充满了未知和危险，但他们的心却因为彼此的支持而更加坚定。</performance>
</character_performance>
</script_draft>

plot_2a.scene: 寻找冰原狼的路上，偶尔可见远处山脉间升起的雾气。树木被霜花装饰得如同童话世界一般。
plot_2a.script_draft:
<script_draft>
<scene_heading>
EXT. FOREST PATH - DAY
</scene_heading>
<character_performance>
<character>ROBB</character>
<performance>Riding a horse, Robb and Bran slowly make their way through the forest, where the mist is gradually dissipating, revealing patches of sunlight on the snow-covered ground.</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>BRAN</character>
<performance>Bran rides alongside Robb, taking in the fairy-tale-like scenery of frost-covered trees and distant mountains with a thin layer of fog rising between them.</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>ROBB</character>
<performance>"Bran, do you remember that summer night?" Robb asks, his voice filled with a warm nostalgia.</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>BRAN</character>
<performance>Bran pauses for a moment, then a look of fondness crosses his eyes. "Of course I do," he says softly. "That night, we all gathered in the great hall of the castle, listening to Old Nan tell ancient stories."</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>ROBB</character>
<performance>Robb smiles and nods. "Yes, that night was truly wonderful. Everyone shared their dreams and wishes."</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>BRAN</character>
<performance>Bran's eyes soften, as if he's back in that warm summer night. "Especially me, I said I wanted to be a knight." He smiles slightly. "I thought I could become a great knight like Father."</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>ROBB</character>
<performance>Robb pats Bran's shoulder, his tone full of encouragement. "You will be a great knight, Bran. No matter what happens, I believe in you."</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>BRAN</character>
<performance>Bran looks up at Robb, meeting his brother's determined gaze, feeling a warmth in his heart. "Thank you, Robb. Having you by my side makes me feel much better."</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>ROBB</character>
<performance>They continue along the path, occasionally stopping to let the horses rest. "No matter what happens, we'll face it together," Robb says firmly.</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>BRAN</character>
<performance>Bran nods, and the two brothers exchange a smile. In this cold and silent forest, their resolve shines as brightly as the weak sunlight, warm and luminous.</performance>
</character_performance>
</script_draft>

plot_2b.scene: 溪水潺潺流过，周围树木挂满霜花，在日光照射下闪闪发光。
plot_2b.script_draft:
<involved_characters>
罗柏, 布兰
</involved_characters>

<script_draft>
<scene_heading>
EXT. 森林中的小溪旁; DAY
</scene_heading>
<character_performance>
<character>场景描述</character>
<performance>溪水潺潺流过，周围树木挂满霜花，在日光照射下闪闪发光。罗柏和布兰坐在一块大石头上，马匹在附近饮水休息。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>布兰望着眼前的溪水，眼神中带着一丝忧郁。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>“罗柏，我真的很担心。”他轻声说道，“我知道父亲受伤了，侍卫也被杀了……但我更害怕的是，我的身体可能会阻碍我实现成为骑士的梦想。”</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>罗柏转头看向弟弟，眼中充满了理解和同情。他轻轻地拍了拍布兰的肩膀。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>“布兰，我知道你心里有很多担忧，但你要相信，无论发生什么，我们都会一起面对。”</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>“可是，”布兰的声音有些颤抖，“我真的能成为一名骑士吗？我的腿……”</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>罗柏打断了他的话，语气坚定而温暖：“布兰，听我说。骑士不仅仅是指那些骑马战斗的人，更重要的是他们心中的勇气和信念。你有着一颗勇敢的心，这比任何外在的能力都重要得多。”</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>布兰抬起头，看着哥哥坚定的眼神，心中涌起一股暖流。“谢谢你，罗柏。有你在身边，我觉得好多了。”</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>“我们是兄弟，无论发生什么，我都会支持你。”罗柏紧紧握住布兰的手，“记住，即使面临逆境，也能找到属于自己的道路。父亲曾经告诉我们，每个人都有自己的使命，你的使命就是成为最好的自己。”</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>布兰点了点头，心中渐渐燃起了希望的火焰。</performance>
</character_performance>
<character_performance>
<character>场景描述</character>
<performance>两人静静地坐了一会儿，听着溪水的流淌声，感受着彼此的支持与鼓励。在这个寒冷而寂静的森林中，他们的决心如同这微弱的阳光一样，温暖而明亮。</performance>
</character_performance>
</script_draft>

plot_3a.scene: 返回的路上，天空阴沉沉的，仿佛预示着即将到来的风雨。
plot_3a.script_draft:
<involved_characters>
罗柏, 布兰
</involved_characters>

<script_draft>
<scene_heading>
EXT. 返回临冬城的路上 - DAY
</scene_heading>
<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>布兰指着前方的一片树林，脸上带着一丝紧张。</performance>
</character_performance>
<dialogue>
<character>布兰</character>
<line>“罗柏，你看那边。”</line>
</dialogue>
<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>罗柏顺着布兰的目光望去，眉头紧锁，脸色凝重。</performance>
</character_performance>
<dialogue>
<character>罗柏</character>
<line>“看来北方的局势比我们想象的还要严峻。这些野人的活动明显增加了。”</line>
</dialogue>
<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>布兰点头，眼中闪过忧虑。</performance>
</character_performance>
<dialogue>
<character>布兰</character>
<line>“他们为什么会在这里？难道是有什么更大的威胁吗？”</line>
</dialogue>
<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>罗柏沉默了一会儿，然后回答。</performance>
</character_performance>
<dialogue>
<character>罗柏</character>
<line>“很有可能。父亲曾经提到过，长城以北的异鬼正在复苏，而野人可能是为了躲避那些怪物才南下的。”</line>
</dialogue>
<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>布兰深吸一口气，点点头表示赞同。</performance>
</character_performance>
<dialogue>
<character>布兰</character>
<line>“你说得对，罗柏。不管未来多么艰难，我们都要一起面对。”</line>
</dialogue>
<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>罗柏坚定地说道，两人策马加速前进。</performance>
</character_performance>
<dialogue>
<character>罗柏</character>
<line>“我们必须尽快回去，把这些情况告诉母亲和其他人。我们需要为未来的战斗做好准备。”</line>
</dialogue>
<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>布兰紧紧握住缰绳，眼中闪烁着坚定的光芒。</performance>
</character_performance>
<dialogue>
<character>布兰</character>
<line>“我明白了，罗柏。我们一起面对这场风暴，一定会战胜一切困难。”</line>
</dialogue>
<character_performance>
<character>罗柏</character>
<performance>罗柏的声音坚定而温暖。</performance>
</character_performance>
<dialogue>
<character>罗柏</character>
<line>“布兰，记住，无论发生什么，我们都不是一个人在战斗。我们会找到办法，保护我们的家园。”</line>
</dialogue>
<character_performance>
<character>布兰</character>
<performance>布兰点头，两兄弟继续沿着小径快速前进。</performance>
</character_performance>
</script_draft>
